DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of needs of moisturizers after various laser treatments
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Needs of Moisturizers After Various Laser Treatments
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators would like to assess of needs of moisturizers after various laser treatment : by investigating the changes in the skin barrier function after fractional carbon dioxide laser and fractional Er:Glass laser in mice and human skin
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years of age without any dermatologic diseases Taking other known dermatologic disease Others who are shown pigmented lesion on treatedarea Who have allergy or history of hypersensitivity reaction to moisturizers Who have other definitive cutaneous findings
